overview: Street Fury: Chrome shines the white hot spotlight on today's import car scene. From illegal street racing in San Diego to the DUB Bikini Show Street Fury: Chrome blows away all competitors from start to finish.Features: Hot Import Nights Show At the LA Convention Center SEMA Show In Las Vegas Behind the Scenes Look at the Cars of The Fast & The Furious and Their Creator George BarrisSand Diego Bikini Show NISEI Show in Los Angeles Illegal Street Racing In Southern California Street Fury: Chrome Cover Model Photo Shoot.
title: Street Fury: Chrome
